title: Moon of Rajab 1446 AH sighted, 1st Rajab  on Thursday
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jan 01 (APP): Ministry of Religious Affairs and Interfaith Harmony on Wednesday officially announced that the moon of Rajab 1446 AH has been sighted in the country.
As a result, the first day of Rajab will commence on Thursday, (Janu 2).
This announcement follows the decision made by the Central Ruet-e-Hilal Committee during its meeting held earlier this day.
